titleStmt.title: An essay upon Statius, or, The five first books of Publ. Papinius Statius his Thebais done into English verse by T.S., with the poetick history illustrated.
Thebais. Liber 1-5. English
titleStmt.author: Statius, P. Papinius (Publius Papinius).
Stephens, Thomas, d. 1677.

notesStmt.note: Translator's name, Thomas Stephens, appears in the dedication and in the commendatory poems.
Cf. Clark, W.A. Early Eng. lit. 1920-25. v. 4, p. 123-124.
First edition of this translation of Thebaid, Books 1-5.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
